meanings.definition: In a manner that is capable of being approved.
meanings.sent1: The student completed the assignment approvably, following all the instructions.
meanings.sent2: The proposal was presented approvably, meeting all the necessary criteria.
meanings.sent3: The cat approached the treat approvably, wagging its tail in anticipation.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight filtered through the leaves, casting an approvably warm glow on the forest floor.
meanings.sent5: Her smile was as bright and approvably genuine as a ray of sunshine.

meanings.definition: In a way that is acceptable or satisfactory.
meanings.sent1: The meal was cooked approvably, pleasing everyone at the dinner table.
meanings.sent2: The repairs were completed approvably, restoring the functionality of the machine.
meanings.sent3: The clown juggled approvably, keeping the audience entertained with his antics.
meanings.sent4: The music flowed through the room, creating an approvably soothing atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: His apology sounded approvably sincere, melting away any lingering tension.
